flawed_nl_solution:
Mary gives away 26/2 = <<26/2=13.0>>13.0 blue shirts.
Mary gives away 36/3 = <<36/3=12.0>>12.0 brown shirts.
Mary has 26-13.0 = <<26-13.0=13.0>>13.0 blue shirts left.
Mary has 36-12.0 = <<36-12.0=42.0>>42.0 brown shirts left.
Mary has 13.0+42.0 = <<13.0+42.0=55.0>>55.0 shirts left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24.0, not 42.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
